√hiṅs 'injure'

present: [7.] hinásti  híṅsanti etc. V.+  hiṅsyā́t etc. B.+  ahinat (3s.)  hiṅsi (2s.)  híṅste etc.   -- [1.] hiṅsati  hiṅsate etc. B.+  

perfect: jihiṅsa  jihiṅsimá  jíhiṅsīs  

aorist: [3.] ajihiṅsat   -- [5.] ahiṅsīt etc. V.+  

future: [1.] hiṅsiṣyati  hiṅsiṣyate etc. B.+   -- [2.] hiṅsitā  

verbal: hiṅsitá AV.+  hiṅsitum B.+  híṅsitos  hiṅsitvā  -hiṅsya  

secondary: passive: hiṅsyate V.+   -- intensive: jehiṅs-   -- desiderative: jíhiṅsiṣati   -- causative: hiṅsayati  

derivatives: hiṅsā B.+  hiṅsaka E.+  hiṅsya S.+  hiṅsana E.+  hiṅsanīya E.+  hiṅsitavyà AV.  hiṅsrá V.+  

Probably an abbreviated desiderative of √han.
